songs.lyrics:
Alright Alright Alright Alright mmmm (3X)
Alright Alright Alright Alright

Sitting on this boardwalk singing one of my favorite ditty’s
Wondering who I gotta kill to travel round and take my family with me
Sometimes I feel like an abandoned city
I swear one second I’m all popping
Then the next I am alone and dizzy
I feel the breeze on my knees it’s getting cold no biggie
I’m chucking leaves in the sea I’m feeling like a hippie
Santa Cruz gets me feeling like this
When I visit to play catalyst it’s
One of my favorite stops if you didn’t know
A few years back me and wife eloped
And celebrated here with just the friends that’s close
I love her madly but my dream requires me to travel
And sometimes when I’m on the road I feel my soul unravel
And now I got the twins at home which doubles all the hassle
Instead of me at home they staring at my plaque for Fragile
Gold plated memories
Candles in the wind blowing next to me
I’m feeling shaken mentally
This ain’t a cry for help cuz I don’t want nobody help
I just need to find my health an take better care of myself
But there’s temptations
There’s double shots of mezcal with friends waiting
To come see us check Satan
Winter fell on us here so please send ravens
I feel like crows on the wall with my flesh shaven
I feel like holding my calls a little Wrekcation
The Hills are watching us all well yeah that’s Wes Craven
I seen rappers merely half my age
Come by with little effort pass my page
Oh Fuck that’s the Devil again and see I’m Otis from the rejects
Lotus flower directs us to find the beauty’s defects
I need to get back cuz we’re rocking in an hour
Plus I see clouds devouring the beach it’s bout to shower
Maybe the bots will come and snatch this down
Shit I don’t know why I trip it ain’t my master sound
This is just a tidbit for the culture
Nipped it for the vultures
To rock the weekly and see who goes over
Signing off once again your family Wrekonoze
California touring got me soaring now I’m next to go

Alright Alright Alright Alright mmmmn (3X)
Alright Alright Alright Alright

17
songs.title: Come Through and Chill (Freestyle)
